Rules.Description: A rule giving user with role MEDL, LEDE, NEST, DAGL, DTPR, DTSO, KOMP, FFØR, REPR, KONT or KNUF and the app owner brg the right to instantiate a instance of a given app of brg/rrh-innrapportering

urn:altinn:org:brg

urn:altinn:org:brg
Rules.Description: Rule that defines that user with role MEDL, LEDE, NEST, DAGL, DTPR, DTSO, KOMP, FFØR, REPR, KONT or KNUF can read and confirm for brg/rrh-innrapportering when it is in TaskBekreftelse

Subject: urn:altinn:rolecode:MEDL
urn:altinn:rolecode:LEDE
urn:altinn:rolecode:NEST

urn:altinn:rolecode:KNUF
urn:altinn:org:brg
Rules.Description: Rule that defines that user with role MEDL, LEDE, NEST, DAGL, DTPR, DTSO, KOMP, FFØR, REPR, KONT or KNUF can delete instances of brg/rrh-innrapportering

Subject: urn:altinn:org:brg
Rules.Description: Rule that defines that org can write to instances of brg/rrh-innrapportering for any states

Subject: urn:altinn:org:brg
Rules.Description: Rule that defines that org can complete an instance of brg/rrh-innrapportering which state is at the end event.

Subject: urn:altinn:rolecode:DAGL
urn:altinn:org:brg
Rules.Description: A rule giving user with role DAGL and the app owner brg the right to read the appresource events of a given app of brg/rrh-innrapportering
